section.p: With a thrill of horror, you realize you have missed your footing, crossing the wrong line by millimetres. The lid of the sarcophagus explodes into the air with a deafening crash, and a pillar of black smoke erupts out of the stone coffin! The column of smoke hurtles towards you, like a miniature tornado.
